Pre-Game Insights: The Pirates have lost eight of their last nine-day games at PNC Park following a win.
The Marlins have won each of their last five-day games after playing the previous day.
The Pirates have failed to cover the run line in eight of their last nine home games against National League opponents following a win.
The Marlins have covered the run line in six of their last seven-day games against National League opponents.
Others: Getting the start for the Pirates will be Bailey Falter who sits with a 7-7 record and an ERA of 4.45.
